TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit RequestContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class RequestContext Implements IDisposable
public ref class RequestContext abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 提供一个与传入请求关联的答复。

span.span: Provides a reply that is correlated to an incoming request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 可获取请求上下文。You get a request context from an . 每个 都会包装答复请求所需的信息，因此等待每个请求消息接收答复时不需要阻止通道。Each encapsulates the information required to reply to the request, so that you do not have to block on the channel when waiting for each request message to receive a reply. 处于请求/答复模式时， 对象是传入的请求与传出的答复之间的桥梁。当服务器接收到一个请求时，它将提供一个 实例，该实例表示对通道的请求。In the request/reply model, the object is the link between the request that comes in and the reply that goes out. When the server receives a request, it provides a instance that represents the request to the channel. 请求上下文包含其他有用属性中的原始请求消息。The request context contains the original request message among other useful properties. 此请求上下文随后会储藏到 中，以便于你的服务对其进行检索。This request context is then stashed inside the for retrieval by your service. 通常可使用 属性来访问当前操作的请求。You typically use the property to access the request of the current operation. 的值可以是 `null`。The value of the can be `null`. 请求上下文的角色是将请求与答复相链接，因此在没有答复时，请求上下文的存在就毫无意义，在这种情况下，此上下文设置为 `null`。Because the role of the request context is to link requests to replies, it does not make sense to have a request context when you do not have a reply, and so in this case the context is set to `null`. 对于请求/答复模式顶部的单向操作，服务器接收请求，但并不向客户端发回响应。For a one-way operation on top of the request/reply model, the server receives requests but does not send back a response to the client. 因此，如果意外出现 为 `null`，首先要检查操作协定是否是 IsOneWay。So if the is `null` unexpectedly, check first whether the operation contract is IsOneWay. 针对从此类派生的托管 C++ 用户的特别说明：Special note for Managed C++ users deriving from this class: - 将清理代码放入 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）中，而不是放入析构函数中。Put your cleanup code in (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort), not in a destructor. - 避免使用析构函数：它们会导致编译器自动生成 。Avoid destructors: they cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用非引用成员：它们可能会导致编译器自动生成 。Avoid non-reference members: they can cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用终结器；但如果包含一个终结器，则应该禁止显示生成警告并从 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）调用 和终结器本身，以便模拟自动生成的 行为。Avoid finalizers; but if you include one, you should suppress the build warning and call and the finalizer itself from (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) to emulate what would have been the auto-generated behavior.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，中止处理与上下文关联的请求。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, aborts processing the request associated with the context.

summary.span: 开始进行异步操作，以答复与当前上下文关联的请求。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to reply to the request associated with the current context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在有无显式超时的情况下，异步操作都可用。The asynchronous operation is available with or without an explicit time-out.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract IAsyncResult BeginReply (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message, AsyncCallback callback, object state);

public: abstract IAsyncResult ^ BeginReply(System::ServiceModel::Channels::Message ^ message, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);

span.span: The incoming that contains the request.

param.name: callback
param.span: 接收异步答复操作完成通知的 委托。

span.span: The delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous reply operation completion.

param.name: state
param.span: 一个由应用程序指定的对象，它包含与异步答复操作相关联的状态信息。

span.span: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous reply operation.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，开始进行异步操作，以答复与当前上下文关联的请求。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, begins an asynchronous operation to reply to the request associated with the current context.
The that references the asynchronous reply operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序处理必须继续进行而不是等待时，使用异步 方法。Use the asynchronous method when the application processing must continue without waiting. 如果当前线程在回复请求消息时可以被阻塞，或者一直被阻塞到超出超时间隔，则使用同步 方法之一。Use one of the synchronous methods when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it replies to the request message or until the time-out interval is exceeded. 此方法通过回调为操作接收事件处理程序标识的通知。This method receives notification, through a callback, of the identity of the event handler for the operation. 直到已发送答复或发生超时时才完成操作。The operation is not complete until either the reply is sent or the time-out occurs.

para.span: 如果在操作完成前超出指定的 ，该操作将引发 。

span.span: The operation throws a if the specified is exceeded before it completes.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，开始进行异步操作，以在指定时间间隔内答复与当前上下文关联的请求。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, begins an asynchronous operation to reply to the request associated with the current context within a specified interval of time.
The that references the asynchronous reply operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用异步 方法，则应用程序处理将继续进行而不等待完成请求。Use the asynchronous method to allow the application processing to continue without waiting for the request to complete. 如果当前线程在回复请求消息时可以被阻塞，或者一直被阻塞到超出超时间隔，则使用同步 方法之一。Use one of the synchronous methods when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it replies to the request message or until the time-out interval is exceeded. 此方法通过回调为操作接收事件处理程序标识的通知。This method receives notification, through a callback, of the identity of the event handler for the operation. 直到已发送答复或发生超时时才完成操作。The operation is not complete until either the reply is sent or the time-out occurs.

para.span: 如果在操作完成前超出指定的 ，该操作将引发 。

span.span: The operation throws a if the specified is exceeded before it completes.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，答复请求消息。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, replies to a request message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前线程在答复请求消息时可以被阻塞，则使用 。Use when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it replies to the request message. 该线程最多被阻塞 `timeout` 指定的时间长度。The thread is blocked up to the specified `timeout`. 如果应用程序处理必须继续进行而不是等待答复完成，则使用异步 方法。If the application processing must continue without waiting for the reply to complete, use the asynchronous method. 此方法通过回调为操作接收事件处理程序标识的通知。This method receives notification, through a callback, of the identity of the event handler for the operation. 直到通道中出现消息时或发生超时时才完成操作。The operation is not complete until either a message becomes available in the channel or the time-out occurs.
